text: Digaula gu halahala Ahaziah, gaa gida a mee e bala hagammuni i Samaria. Digaula gaa lahi a mee gi Jehu, ga daaligi a mee gii made. Malaa, digaula guu danu tuaidina o maa i di nadau hagalaamua tamana madua o maa go King Jehoshaphat, dela nogo hagamahi ono lodo di hai ana mee ala e mee i dono hai e hagagila di hiihai a Dimaadua.
